title: Karlie Guse stepmom admits: I gave the wrong description of my daughter's clothes
itunes:title: Karlie Guse stepmom admits: I gave the wrong description of my daughter's clothes
description:
Karlie Guse disappeared from her home in a small California town nearly two weeks ago. Nancy Grace talks in this episode with the last person known to have seen the 16-year-old -- stepmother Melissa Guse -- and the teen's father, Zachery Guse. Nancy's expert panel includes Dr. Brian Russell, lawyer and psychologist and host of Investigation Discovery’s “Fatal Vows” series, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, and reporter Robyn Walensky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
